description: Absolute or relative path of the condition directory (parent of run_XX).
Absolute or relative path of the run directory (…/run_XX).
Numeric run identifier parsed from run_XX.
Path to the *_offline_metrics.csv used to summarize init/last snapshots for this run.
Frobenius norm of the recurrent matrix W at initialization.
Frobenius norm of W at last snapshot (latest epoch).
Change in Frobenius norm from init to last (last - init).
Frobenius norm of the symmetric component S = (W+Wᵀ)/2 at initialization.
Frobenius norm of S at last snapshot.
Change in ||S||_F (last - init).
Frobenius norm of the antisymmetric component A = (W−Wᵀ)/2 at initialization.
Frobenius norm of A at last snapshot.
Change in ||A||_F (last - init).
Mixing ratio ||A||_F / (||S||_F + ε) at initialization.
Mixing ratio at last snapshot.
Change in mixing ratio (last - init).
||S||_F / (||W||_F + ε) at initialization.
Symmetry ratio at last snapshot.
Change in symmetry ratio (last - init).
||A||_F / (||W||_F + ε) at initialization.
Asymmetry ratio at last snapshot.
Change in asymmetry ratio (last - init).
||WWᵀ − WᵀW||_F at initialization.
Non-normality at last snapshot.
Change in non-normality (last - init).
Max eigenvalue magnitude of W at initialization.
Max eigenvalue magnitude at last snapshot.
Change in spectral radius of W (last - init).
Spectral norm (largest singular value) of W at initialization.
Spectral norm at last snapshot.
Change in operator norm (last - init).
κ(W) = σ_max / σ_min at initialization (regularized if needed).
Condition number at last snapshot.
Change in condition number (last - init).
Max eigenvalue magnitude of S at initialization.
Max eigenvalue magnitude of S at last snapshot.
Change in spectral radius of S (last - init).
Max eigenvalue magnitude of A at initialization.
Max eigenvalue magnitude of A at last snapshot.
Change in spectral radius of A (last - init).
Epoch index of the initialization snapshot (often 0 or NaN).
Epoch index of the last snapshot used for summary.
Any numeric column from replay evaluation, prefixed with 'replay_'. Example: replay_mse, replay_ring_decode_R2.
Any numeric column from prediction evaluation, prefixed with 'prediction_'. Example: prediction_time_to_divergence, prediction_phase_drift.
Any numeric column from open-loop evaluation, prefixed with 'openloop_'. Example: openloop_mse, openloop_angle_error_R.
Any numeric column from closed-loop evaluation, prefixed with 'closedloop_'. Example: closedloop_mse, closedloop_divergence_time.
Fallback prefix when mode not inferred from filename; contains numeric columns from the evaluation CSV.
